name: Simple White X grayish
description: This style changes the theme Simple White X for Firefox. It makes the toolbars have a light gray background similar to the background in Firefox's default theme. It darkens the frame area (with the section tabs) of the Options and the Add-ons Manager pages. It also darkens the background of the panels from the buttons in the toolbar, e.g., the menu. (Updated for 2.2b18.x1.09.)
additional_info: This style will affect other themes for Firefox in adverse manner. After the Simple White X upgraded to version 2.2b18.x1.09, the toolbars below the navigation bar were not being changed properly. This is now corrected.
